segments.text: Excuse me . Would you mind trading seats with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank you . That ’ s very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . I prefer a window seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you do ? Good . Looking out of the window sometimes scares me . So I prefer to be the man in the middle .
segments.speaker: S1
